abusinessl: Exxon Mobil Corp, located in Spring, Texas, is an international energy and petrochemical company. The Company's primary businesses include exploration for, and production of, crude oil and natural gas; manufacture, trade, transport and sale of crude oil, natural gas, petroleum products, petrochemicals, and a variety of specialty products; and pursuit of lower-emission business opportunities including carbon capture and storage, hydrogen, lower-emission fuels, and lithium. Its segments include Upstream, Energy Products, Chemical Products, and Specialty Products. The Upstream segment explores for and produces crude oil and natural gas. The Energy Products, Chemical Products, and Specialty Products segments manufactures and sells petroleum products and petrochemicals. Energy Products include fuels, aromatics, and catalysts and licensing. Its Chemical Products consists of olefins, polyolefins, and intermediates. Its Specialty Products include finished lubricants, synthetics, and elastomers and resins. The Company was founded on November 30, 1999.
tbusinessl: Mozambique Rovuma Venture Spa is engaged in the crude petroleum and natural gas services business. The Company is located in Maputo, Mozambique. Company is located in Maputo, Mozambique.

abusinessl: Jin Yu Tang Shenzhen Fishery Co Ltd is a finfish fishing establishment. The Company is located in Shenzhen, China.
tbusinessl: Stonechen Comercial Produtos de Pesca de Moma Ltd is a finfish fishing establishment. The Company is located in Nampula, Mozambique.

abusinessl: Amire Glory Ltd is a dimension stone quarry operator. The Company is located in the United Kingdom.
tbusinessl: TCT Industrias Florestais Ltd is a dimension stone quarry operator. Its business includes timber tract operations. It owns a substantial limestone deposit and forestry business located on rail in the Sofala Province of Mozambique. It offers timber, furniture, turnings, wooden houses, bee hives and honey related products. The Company is located in Sofala, Mozambique.

abusinessl: Oiltanking GmbH, located in Hamburg, Germany, provides oil and gas storage services. It also offers support services such as storage infrastructure, dry bulk, outsourcing, and engineering, procurement, and construction services. It operates 72 terminals in 22 countries across Europe, North and South America, Middle East, and Asia. The Company was founded in 1972.
tbusinessl: Galana Mozambique LTD is a petroleum bulk wholesaler. The Company is located in Mauritius.

abusinessl: Kibo Capital Partners Ltd is a Private Equity Firm. It also operates in Kenya through its branch office. The Company is located in Ebene, Mauritius.
tbusinessl: Tropigalia SA is a grocery products wholesaler. The Company was founded in 2004 and is located in Maputo, Mozambique.
